column3: â€œTime stands still with Flowerbomb. This strain is definitely a heavy hitter. I had a cold when I tried this in Amsterdam, so that may have caused me to feel the effects of this strain a bit more than most people. After taking a few hits, my body felt super heavy and all of my movements and thoughts seemed to slow. way. down. All I wanted to do was sit in a quite space and nap. While my friend was super hungry after t...â€

â€œI Grew this strain from one of Greenhouse Seeds feminized seeds. The plant is strong and robust, Huge fan leaves with hints of blue and purple a very dark green. The flowers are very dense and compact, Not a big producer but the quality of the flowers is High Grade! It was finished the second week of October here in Northern California, The flowers look great in a jar! Ver dark green with bright red hairs, tons of cr...â€

â€œI love how this strain made me feel. I was really relaxed and kind of not motivated to do much after about 20 minutes of being high. 
Like every strain, whenever it hits me I am mostly energetic and hyper and jumping around. 
For most strains these feelings continue to flow throughout the high (the next few hours). 

With Flowerbomb Kush however, this is not exactly the case. 
An Indica high is quite different from a...â€
â€œLove the nameâ€

â€œWow. From the first bowl this strain instantly became my new #1. Super dense hybrid-like buds that are covered in trichromes.. The high hits you fast but the full effects don't set in for a good 10-15 min, however they can last forever. Flowerbomb perfectly incorporates the genetics of it's two parents, green crack and og kush. This is an all day everyday strain, perfect for anxiety and insomnia alike. Not for beginn...â€
â€œone of my favorite strains ,citrus earthy typa taste with skunk when you exhaleâ€
â€œGot an eighth while in Vegas, buds tend to be small, great if you're walking and want to experience everything around you, it opens your eyes a second time to say...â€

â€œTried this at the Greenhouse in Amsterdam last year. Fell in love with the smell and appearance of the flower instantly. The smoke was thick, heavy and very flavourful. Potent as all hell and long lasting so it's definitely more for the seasoned smoker. 10/10 for my all time favourite strain.â€
â€œOn of the best strains ever had! Euphoric and uplifting..it takes you really high, along with the ultimate mellow mood you will ever experience! Highly recomended!â€

â€œLight head high that gradually escalates to a relaxed euphoria.  Synesthesia effects on skin with light penetration into the muscle beginning about 5-8 minutes into the session.  Very relaxing and calming indica strain with more of a clear focused head high that allows for work.  Great for after work to begin the evening with.â€

â€œI was grown and smoked the Flowerbomb Kush.
The cultivation did not really pay off.
The smoke is good. Strong stoned effect. Almost immediately starts to work. Medical level.
The taste is clean, white pepper and lightly spicy ginger. The smell slightly citrusy, slightly anise.
My summary of my assessment: 4/5.â€
â€œIncredible strain. Smoked it while writing this review. Watching drillbit Taylor getting ready for bed. Long day at work tomorrow. Excellent strain for relaxation and stress relief!â€
â€œgd gas,,hood review soufside #Highlifeâ€
â€œJust the right balanceâ€

â€œYou can definetly notice that this has some connection with Green Crack. A great strain to help people who have a tendency to overthink secondary to anxiety. Once smoked, it has a perfect balance of a sedative-like effect mixed with a mild/moderate cerebral buzz. It will have you laughing at everything and you will quickly forget what you were once stressing about prior to smoking.  A great strain all around and land...â€

â€œReally nice!  It gives me a nice mellow high, and is pretty potent to boot!  Flavour is light and floral at the beginning, and holds it pretty well throughout a bowl.â€

â€œWow! Picked up a couple grams from my local dispensary. When I got home, I packed a bowl, put on a record and couldn't help but dance. Im a big dude, so me dance don't happen to often. Recommended to anyone feelin down or need a pick me up!â€

Strong body relaxationâ€

â€œMy friend kept telling me how this was real fruity tasting and that I'd really enjoy it and he was right! I absolutely love this strain! I found it to have a more earthy/spicy taste but smelt slightly fruity. Currently Watching Getting Doug With High while smoking this! If someone from the show sees this do more shows with an audience! and have them smoke this because oh my fuck that would be rad!!!â€
â€œLove the taste and relaxed feeling. Helps me be stress freeâ€

â€œMy favorite strain. Very complex flavor that to me is never the same and tastes very sweet. Not a strain for beginners. Heavy body high that relaxes away the stress of the day and gives a good nights sleep.â€

â€œVery good strain. Nice smell of almost a lemony earthy cookie dough to best describe it and smokes great. Won't mind getting this again since the effects gave me a fantastic sleep!!!â€
â€œThis strain is intense from the beginning and will last for a few hours. Beginners should not smoke to much or the bomb will sit you down, and you will definitely loose track of time. Top 5â€
